credential_server package¶

The server class for the ap, it can recieve data from ap and send data to the api. when get data from the api, it can also send the data back to the ap.

Submodules¶

credential_server.dataHandler module¶

class credential_server.dataHandler.dataHandler¶

Bases: object

this class can read in the data sent by the client and send data to the api and get response

hanle_data(data)¶

choose diffrent function according to the data type

Parameters

data (dict) – a dictionary recieved from the client

update_booking(booking_id, booking)¶

update booking data

Parameters

  • booking_id (string) – the booking id of the booking

  • booking (string) – the booking data to be put in the database
